website_summaries.verdict: The K-swiss Washburn features a smooth synthetic upper that makes it look sleek. It comes with a subtle perforated signature five stripes that represent the branding. With a slightly padded insole, the shoe offers just the right amount of snug on feet. This shoe, nonetheless, delivers comfort and style at an affordable price.
pros: The K-swiss Washburn serves a clean and refined silhouette, according to tons of reviewers
Several satisfied purchasers say that they get a lot of compliments wearing the shoes
Because of the model’s simple but classy design, many commenters state that it is ideal for everyday wear
The Washburn sneaker from K-swiss fits comfortably with the right size, in the opinion of a few reviewers
A number of testers say that the shoe is built with quality materials
The K-swiss Washburn is an excellent value for the money, says a reviewer
Many are impressed by the Chesnut colorway of the model
cons: The Washburn sneaker from K-Swiss fits narrow, states a bunch of wearers
A reviewer attests that the shoe needs a long break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Awesome good looking and comfortable shoes at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: This are leather shoes so the first time you wear them is normal to feel them kind of hard and narrow, but after an hour or two they start to adjust to the form of the feet , getting too wide shoes with the time arise in shoes too difficult to adjust and with little support to the feet... in few words I love my K-Swiss shoes! I purchased the gray ones and planning to get other colors
customer_reviews.author: Yorman G.

customer_reviews.title: Tight across the toes
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these K-Swiss, but they run much narrower across the toe than all of the other K-Swiss shoes I've purchased. They are leather, so I'm going to try and have them stretched
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Somewhat Small In The Toe Area
customer_reviews.text: Usually buy a size 9 in sneakers, but this one fitted tight in the toe area. Like to look of it, but I do wonder if it really made of leather, as I stated, it was small in the toe area and has not conformed to my foot size.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, etc. I love the fast delivery. The fold at the toe feels a wee bit different than my classics, but that may just be a matter of the break-in period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 pair and I've not been disappointed with K-Swiss yet other than being a little let ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 pair and I've not been disappointed with K-Swiss yet other than being a little let down that my last pair didn't make 2 years of primary shoe use like the previous pair =P
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pofahl

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: the k-swiss Washburn is conservative enough for the office on Fridays and causal enough to wear with shorts on the weekend. I typically wear an US 11D in dress shoes and US 12D in athletic shoes. I got the 12D and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JLRNAZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, I literally wear it everyday now. Informal but classy and really comfy
customer_reviews.author: boggart

customer_reviews.title: Goood
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so it's extremely hard to find the right fit. I got alot of complements on them when I wore them yesterday. Just wished they fit like my casual sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: barry cobb

customer_reviews.title: but I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: A bit small, but I like it very much, most of the code recommendations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I thought i would try something different but it didn't fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gomez

customer_reviews.title: The width of these shoes is too narrow to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: The width of these shoes is too narrow to wear it. They're killing my feet all day long. It's awful shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nam H.

customer_reviews.title: K Swiss for life
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes ! I have some older kswiss shoes that are better cushion and overall quality. I like these, but I will probably use a cushion insert to make them softer. The brown color and matching gum base make this a very good looking shoe. The toe even has a nice toe cap that can be super shine polished. I'm not downranking the new kswiss shoes, but the older ones were just way above the rest. I find the current ones good shoes too, just not as good as they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jane's Addiction

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear a size 10 for everything. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 10 for everything. I should have got an 11 for these ! go up one size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes, but I have flat feet so my comment on arch support is a little biased. the shoe is somewhat narrow (and I have narrow feet). Overall though comfortable for all day wear. I plan on getting some arch supports to aid a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying K-Swiss for close to 20 years. I still have two pairs. One from about ten years ago and another from about seven years ago. They've changed about three or so years ago. I don't know where they're made now but get someone else. The design is the cause. The high "walls" around the shoe make it impossible for it to fit correctly. Even if you use the stretch liquid. I wear an 11 1/2 and I would have to have a 12 for these to fit and I would be stupid to pay more for a larger size. They will be returned for my money back. Sorry K-Swiss but you deserve this one.
customer_reviews.author: Wind Singer

product_meta.title: K-Swiss Shoes Washburn P Red Size:
product_meta.description: The washburn is symbol elevated style. Versatile enough to be dressed up or dress down. Premium full grain leather wraps the foot to create a smooth, refined look. The upper is complimented by a clean rubber outsole. With tonal laces, subtle five stripe perforations, and an embossed tongue logo, the richness is in the details of this latest court classic.
feature_bullets: Perforated leather sneaker featuring blind eyelets and logo embossing at tongue
